name: Clinic Care Program
descr:
This module is the heart of ClinicCare system and has to be installed prior to use of any additional modules. This module supports important everyday tasks carried out by a clinics secretary. This allows the busy secretaries to perform their normal duties more effeciently and helps ease the demands on their time and allows better debt-control. Records clients details. Patients billing. Allows direct billing of insurance companies, sports clubs etc. Credit/debt management. Registration of payments: part-payment, payment in advance. Sales/payment statistics and reports. Stock control. Printing labels for medical files/X-Rays. Phonebook/registration of other addresses. Barcode printing (can by used for quick reference when used with a barcode reader.

Request further information.
